results.rule_description: EKS Clusters should have cluster control plane logging turned on
results.impact: Logging provides valuable information about access and usage
results.resolution: Enable logging for the EKS control plane
results.description: Control plane scheduler logging is not enabled.

results.rule_description: IAM policy should avoid use of wildcards and instead apply the principle of least privilege
results.impact: Overly permissive policies may grant access to sensitive resources
results.resolution: Specify the exact permissions required, and to which resources they should apply instead of using wildcards.
results.description: IAM policy document uses sensitive action 'logs:CreateLogGroup' on wildcarded resource 'arn:aws:logs:*:*:*'
